name: canopy-plugin-typescript
description: TypeScript implementation of the Canopy blockchain plugin

scripts.build:proto: pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs -o src/proto/index.js proto/*.proto && pbts -o src/proto/index.d.ts src/proto/index.js && cp src/proto/index.js src/proto/index.cjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build:proto && npm run build:descriptors && npm run build
